definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: To reverse the " decline " in sales of Sable, and Mercury are also great to cut costs.
sentences.chinese: 扭轉銷售下降的紫貂，水星也主要成本削減。

sentences.english: Ok, having discussed Mercury retrograde, now let's go on to other things.
sentences.chinese: 好了，說完水星逆行，我們現在繼續磋議其他的。

sentences.english: The Moon's sunlit crescent is sinking into the colorful twilight glow just left of Mercury.
sentences.chinese: 新月形的月亮正在落入水星左側的彩色晨曦之中。

sentences.english: On those days Mercury will conjoin Jupiter, a lovely influence.
sentences.chinese: 屆時水星將結合木星，產生可愛的影響力。

sentences.english: Your ruling planet Mercury will encounter transforming Pluto this morning from your astrological money sector.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午你的主星水星會刑你的財帛宮冥王。

sentences.english: Mercury and Saturn readily fit within the same binocular field.
sentences.chinese: 在同一個雙眼領域內和土星欣然合適的水星。

sentences.english: This is its first processed color image since entering Mercury orbit.
sentences.chinese: 這是信使號進入水星軌道後發回的首張彩色照片。

sentences.english: Today marks Mercury's turnaround and direct motion and it will be transiting your sign.
sentences.chinese: 今天，水星轉向並恢復順行，在你的宮位內。

sentences.english: Mercury is still retrograding so you may run into some delays.
sentences.chinese: 但水星仍然在逆行，因此你可能會遭遇延誤。

sentences.english: Does blue Shantou Mercury Fangte paradise open the door several AM?
sentences.chinese: 汕頭藍水星方特樂園早上幾點開門？

sentences.english: " asked Chile's Mercurio newspaper after Brazil had eliminated the hosts in the semi-final.
sentences.chinese: 智利《水星》報在巴西隊半決賽淘汰東道主後發問。

sentences.english: With Mercury squaring up to Neptune and Jupiter we're talking about high hopes.
sentences.chinese: 因爲水星與海王星和木星成方角的意思就是的厚望。

sentences.english: After his breakdown over the Mercedes wiper, he was unable to work.
sentences.chinese: 由於水星雨刷，卡恩斯陷入了崩潰，而不能工作。

sentences.english: You may be able to get paid before Mercury retrogrades.
sentences.chinese: 這樣就可能在水星逆行之前要回欠債。

sentences.english: Innermost planet Mercury is below Venus, to the right.
sentences.chinese: 太陽系中最靠內的水星位於金星右下方。

sentences.english: Mercury Series auction results and Section 99A of the data in 1939.
sentences.chinese: 拍賣結果和數據水星系列1939年第99A條。

definition: Pallas, an asteroid, discovered in 1802 by H.W. Olbers
Aquarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/also called 水瓶座
gold star/stars (that one sees from blow to the head etc)
Vesta, an asteroid, second most massive object in the asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter, discovered in 1807 by H.W. Olbers
aspect of the celestial bodies (used for navigation and astrology)

the twelve equatorial constellations or signs of the zodiac in Western astronomy and astrology, namely: Aries 白羊[Bai2 yang2], Taurus 金牛[Jin4 niu2], Gemini 雙子|双子[Shuang1 zi3], Cancer 巨蟹[Ju4 xie4], Leo 獅子|狮子[Shi1 zi3], Virgo 室女[Shi4 nu:3], Libra 天秤[Tian1 cheng4], Scorpio 天蠍|天蝎[Tian1 xie1], Sagittarius 人馬|人马[Ren2 ma3], Capricorn 摩羯[Mo2 jie2], Aquarius 寶瓶|宝瓶[Bao3 ping2], Pisces 雙魚|双鱼[Shuang1 yu2]
Sagittarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
